notYetEligible: Nturaragera ku gihe cyo gutanga inkunga. Komeza kuzigama, uzagera ku ntego yawe vuba!
timeUntilDonate: Hasigaye ukwezi {{months}} n’iminsi {{days}} mbere yo gutanga inkunga
daysUntilDonate: Hasigaye iminsi {{days}} mbere yo gutanga inkunga
reachedMilestone: Wageze ku ntego y’amezi 6 yo kuzigama. Igihe kirageze cyo gutanga umusanzu!
commitmentExplanation: Nk’uko byiyemejwe muri AidVault, 20% by’amafaranga wizigamye atangwa mu burezi bw’abana. Ushobora no gutanga arenzeho niba ubishaka!
confirmationText: Nemeye ko inkunga yanjye ingana na {{amount}} RWF izajya gufasha uburezi bw’abana no kubabonera ibikoresho by’ishuri.
makingRealDifference: Inkunga yawe iri gutanga impinduka zifatika mu buzima bw’abana.
cycleReset: Icyiciro cyawe cyo kuzigama cyasubiwemo. Tangira kongera kuzigama wongere ugire ingaruka mu mezi 6 ari imbere!
confirmationRequired: Nyamuneka emeza ko wasobanukiwe uko inkunga izakoreshwa
invalidAmount: Inkunga ntoya yemerewe ni {{amount}} RWF (20% by’amafaranga yawe)
